info.title: Open Charge Map
info.description: The Open Charge Map service provides access to the worlds largest registry of charging locations. You can integrate this service into your own apps or services and export charging location data into your own systems.

get.description: Used to fetch a list of POIs (sites) within a geographic boundary or near a specific latitude/longitude.

parameters.name: output
parameters.description: Optional output format `json`,`geojson`,`xml`,`csv`, JSON is the default and recommended as the highest fidelity.

parameters.name: client
parameters.description: String to identify your client application. Optional but recommended to distinguish your client from other bots/crawlers

parameters.name: maxresults
parameters.description: Limit on max number of results returned

parameters.name: countrycode
parameters.description: 2-character ISO Country code to filter to one specific country

parameters.name: countryid
parameters.description: Exact match on a given numeric country id (comma separated list)

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Latitude for distance calculation and filtering

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude for distance calculation and filtering

parameters.name: distance
parameters.description: Optionally filter results by a max distance from the given latitude/longitude

parameters.name: distanceunit
parameters.description: `miles` or `km` distance unit

parameters.name: operatorid
parameters.description: Exact match on a given EVSE operator id (comma separated list)

parameters.name: connectiontypeid
parameters.description: Exact match on a given connection type id (comma separated list)

parameters.name: levelid
parameters.description: Exact match on a given charging level (1-3) id (comma separated list)

parameters.name: usagetypeid
parameters.description: Exact match on a given usage type id (comma separated list)

parameters.name: statustypeid
parameters.description: Exact match on a given status type id (comma separated list)

parameters.name: dataproviderid
parameters.description: Exact match on a given data provider id id (comma separated list).

parameters.name: opendata
parameters.description: Use opendata=true for only OCM provided ("Open") data.

parameters.name: includecomments
parameters.description: If true, user comments and media items will be include in result set

parameters.name: verbose
parameters.description: Set to false to get a smaller result set with null items removed.

parameters.name: compact
parameters.description: Set to true to remove reference data objects from output (just returns IDs for common reference data such as DataProvider etc).

parameters.name: camelcase
parameters.description: Set to true to get a property names in camelCase format.

parameters.name: chargepointid
parameters.description: Exact match on a given OCM POI ID (comma separated list)

parameters.name: boundingbox
parameters.description: Filter results to a given bounding box. specify top left and bottom right box corners as: (lat,lng),(lat2,lng2)

parameters.name: polygon
parameters.description: Filter results within a given Polygon. Specify an encoded polyline for the polygon shape. Polygon will be automatically closed from the last point to the first point.

parameters.name: polyline
parameters.description: Filter results along an encoded polyline, use with distance param to increase search distance along line. Polyline is expanded into a polygon to cover the search distance.

200.description: List of POIs (sites) with associated equipment summary information.

get.description: Returns the core reference data used for looking up IDs such as Connection Types, Operators, Countries etc.

parameters.name: countryid
parameters.description: Optional filter on country identifier, exact match on a given numeric country id (comma separated list)

POI.title: POI
POI.description: A POI (Point of Interest), also referred to as a `Site` or `ChargePoint`, is the top-level set of information regarding a geographic site with one or more electric vehicle charging equipment present.

ID.description: The OCM reference ID for this POI (Point of Interest).
ID.title: ID

UUID.description: A universally unique identifier used as surrogate key. ID and UUID must be preserved when submitting POI update information.
UUID.title: UUID

UserComments.description: A list of user comments or check-ins for this site
UserComments.title: User Comments

MediaItems.description: A list of user submitted photos for this site
MediaItems.title: Media Items

IsRecentlyVerified.description: A dynamically computed value indicating of any recently confirmation activity has taken place for this site (positive check-ins etc)
IsRecentlyVerified.title: Is Recently Verified

DateLastVerified.description: A dynamically computed value, the date and time (UTC, ISO 8601) this POI was last confirmed by a user edit or related user comment
DateLastVerified.title: Date Last Verified

ParentChargePointID.description: If present, this data in this POI supercedes information in another POI. Generally not relevant to consumers.
ParentChargePointID.title: Parent Charge Point ID

DataProviderID.description: The reference ID for the Data Provider of this POI
DataProviderID.title: Data Provider ID

DataProvidersReference.description: If present, this is the Data Providers own key for this POI within their source data set
DataProvidersReference.title: Data Provider Reference

OperatorID.description: The reference ID of the equipment network operator or owner
OperatorID.title: Operator ID

OperatorsReference.description: The network operators own reference for this site (may be a site reference or a single equipment reference)
OperatorsReference.title: Operators Reference

UsageTypeID.description: The reference ID for the site Usage Type, 0 == Unknown
UsageTypeID.title: Usage Type ID

UsageCost.description: Free text description of likely usage costs associated with this site. Generally relates to parking charges whether network operates this site as Free
UsageCost.title: Usage Cost

Connections.description: List of equipment summary information for this site
Connections.title: Connections

NumberOfPoints.description: The number of bays or discreet stations available overall at this site. This indicates the limiting for number of simultaneous site users.
NumberOfPoints.title: Number of Points

GeneralComments.description: General additional factual information for the POI. Users are discouraged from using this field for opinions on site quality etc.
GeneralComments.title: General Comments

DatePlanned.description: The date and time (UTC, ISO 8601) this POI is or was planned for commissioning. In general planned POIs should not be presented to end users until confirmed operational.
DatePlanned.title: Date Planned

DateLastConfirmed.description: The date and time (UTC, ISO 8601) this POI was last confirmed according to the data provider or a user. See DateLastVerified for a dynamically computed date based on multiple signals.
DateLastConfirmed.title: Date Last Confirmed

StatusTypeID.description: The overall operational status type reference ID for this POI (i.e. Operational etc). 0 == Unknown
StatusTypeID.title: Status Type ID

DateLastStatusUpdate.description: The date and time (UTC, ISO 8601) this POI or directly related child properties were updated.
DateLastStatusUpdate.title: Date Last Status Update

MetadataValues.description: Optional array of metadata values. Generally used to indicate data attribution but is also intended for future use to indicate surrounding amenties, links or foreign key values into other data sets.
MetadataValues.title: Metadata Values

DataQualityLevel.description: A metric applied during imports to indicate a quality level based on available information detail (5 == best). Largely unused currently.
DataQualityLevel.title: Data Quality Level

DateCreated.description: The date and time (UTC, ISO 8601) this POI was added to the Open Charge Map database
DateCreated.title: Date Created

SubmissionStatusTypeID.description: The reference ID for the submission status type which applied to this POI.
SubmissionStatusTypeID.title: Submission Status Type ID

DataProvider.title: DataProvider
DataProvider.description: A Data Provider is the controller of the source data set used to construct the details for this POI. Data has been transformed and interpreted from it's original form. Each Data Provider provides data either by an explicit license or agreement.

WebsiteURL.description: Website URL for this data provider
WebsiteURL.title: Website URL

Comments.description: General public comments with information about this Data Provider.
Comments.title: Comments

IsRestrictedEdit.description: Currently not implemented. Indicates a potential editing restriction.
IsRestrictedEdit.title: Is Edit Restricted

IsOpenDataLicensed.description: If true, data provider uses an Open Data license
IsOpenDataLicensed.title: Is Open Data Licensed

IsApprovedImport.description: If false, data may not be imported for this provider.
IsApprovedImport.title: Is Approved Import

License.description: Summary of the licensing which applies for this Data Provider. Each Data Provider has one specific license or agreement. Usage of the data requires acceptance of the given license.
License.title: License

DateLastImported.description: Date and time (UTC) the last import was performed for this data provider (if an import).
DateLastImported.title: Date Last Imported

ID.description: The reference ID for this Data Provider
ID.title: ID

Title.description: The title for this Data Provider
Title.title: Title

OperatorInfo.title: OperatorInfo
OperatorInfo.description: An Operator is the public organisation which controls a network of charging points.

WebsiteURL.description: Website for more information about this network
WebsiteURL.title: Website URL

PhonePrimaryContact.description: Primary contact number for network users
PhonePrimaryContact.title: Primary Contact Phone

IsPrivateIndividual.description: If true, this operator represents a private individual
IsPrivateIndividual.title: Is Private Individual

FaultReportEmail.description: Used to send automated notification to network operator if a user submits a fault report comment/check-in
FaultReportEmail.title: Fault Report Email

IsRestrictedEdit.description: If true, this network restricts community edits for OCM data
IsRestrictedEdit.title: Is Edit Restricted

UsageType.title: UsageType
UsageType.description: The Usage Type of a site indicates the general restrictions on usage.

IsPayAtLocation.description: If true, usage requires paying at location
IsPayAtLocation.title: Is Pay At Location

IsMembershipRequired.description: If true, this usage type requires registration or membership with a service.
IsMembershipRequired.title: Is Membership Required

IsAccessKeyRequired.description: If true this usage required a physical access key
IsAccessKeyRequired.title: Is Access Key Required

StatusType.title: StatusType
StatusType.description: The Status Type of a site or equipment item indicates whether it is generally operational.

SubmissionStatusType.title: SubmissionStatusType
SubmissionStatusType.description: Submission Status object, detailing the POI listing status.

IsLive.description: If true, POI listing is live (not draft or de-listed)
IsLive.title: Is Live

AddressInfo.title: AddressInfo
AddressInfo.description: The geographic position for site and (nearest) address component information.

AddressLine1.description: First line of nearby street address
AddressLine1.title: Address Line

AddressLine2.description: Second line of nearby street address
AddressLine2.title: Address Line 2

CountryID.description: The reference ID for the Country
CountryID.title: Country ID

Latitude.description: Site latitude coordinate in decimal degrees
Latitude.title: Latitude

Longitude.description: Site longitude coordinate in decimal degrees
Longitude.title: Longitude

AccessComments.description: Guidance for users to use or find the equipment
AccessComments.title: Access Comments

Distance.description: Distance from search location, if search is around a point
Distance.title: Distance

DistanceUnit.description: Unit used for distance, 1= Miles, 2 = KM
DistanceUnit.title: Distance Unit

Title.description: General title for this location to aid user
Title.title: Title

UserComment.title: UserComment
UserComment.description: A user comment or check-in for a specific charging point (POI/Site).

CheckinStatusTypeID.description: The check in status type identifier.
CheckinStatusTypeID.title: Check In Status Type ID

MediaItem.title: MediaItem
MediaItem.description: A user submitted media item related to a specific charge point or site. Currently always an image.

ConnectionInfo.title: ConnectionInfo
ConnectionInfo.description: Details on the equipment type and power capability.

Reference.description: Optional operators reference for this connection/port
Reference.title: Reference

LevelID.description: A general category for power capability. Deprecated in favour of documenting specific equipment power in kW.
LevelID.title: Level ID

Amps.description: EVSE supply max current in Amps
Amps.title: Amps

CurrentTypeID.description: The supply type reference ID (e.g. DC etc)
CurrentTypeID.title: Current Type ID

Quantity.description: Optional summary number of equipment items available with this specification
Quantity.title: Quantity

ConnectionType.title: ConnectionType
ConnectionType.description: The type of end-user connection an EVSE supports.

FormalName.description: Formal (standard) name for this connection type
FormalName.title: Formal Name

IsDiscontinued.description: If true, this is an discontinued but used connection type
IsDiscontinued.title: Is Discontinued

IsObsolete.description: If true, this is an obsolete connection type and is unlikely top be present in modern infrastructure
IsObsolete.title: Is Obsolete

LevelType.title: LevelType
LevelType.description: A general category for equipment power capability. Deprecated for general use. Currently computed automatically based on equipment power.

IsFastChargeCapable.description: If true, this level is considered 'fast' charging, relative to other levels.

SupplyType.title: SupplyType
SupplyType.description: Indicates the EVSE power supply type e.g. DC (Direct Current), AC (Single Phase), AC (3 Phase).

UserInfo.title: UserInfo
UserInfo.description: The short public summary profile for a specific Open Charge Map user.

CheckinStatusType.title: CheckinStatusType
CheckinStatusType.description: Classification for the users comment or experience using a specific charging location.

IsAutomatedCheckin.description: If true, check in or comment was provided by an automated system.
IsAutomatedCheckin.title: Is Check In Automated

IsPositive.description: If true, this type of check in/comment is considered positive.
IsPositive.title: Is Positive

CoreReferenceData.title: CoreReferenceData
CoreReferenceData.description: Set of core reference data used for other API results and UI.

UserCommentType.title: UserCommentType
UserCommentType.description: Category for a user comment, e.g. General Comment, Fault Report (Notice To Users And Operator).

UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Full user profile, including non-public fields such as Email Address.

chargePointID.description: This must be a valid POI ID
chargePointID.title: Charge Point ID

commentTypeID.description: This must be a valid Comment Type ID as per UserCommentTypes found in Core Reference Data. If left as null then General Comment will be used.
commentTypeID.title: Comment Type ID

userName.description: This is an optional name to associate with the submission, for authenticated users their profile username is used.
userName.title: Username

comment.description: This is an optional comment to describe the charging experience, may include guidance for future users.
comment.title: Comment

rating.description: Optional integer rating between 1 = Worst, 5 = Best.
rating.title: Rating

relatedURL.description: Optional website URL for related information
relatedURL.title: Related URL

checkinStatusTypeID.description: Optional valid CheckStatusTypeID to indicate overall catgeory and success/failure to use equipment e.g. 10 = Charged Successfully.
checkinStatusTypeID.title: Check In Status Type ID

access_token.description: JWT Bearer Token to use in subsequent authenticated requests
access_token.title: Access Token

DataProviderStatusType.title: DataProviderStatusType
DataProviderStatusType.description: Status object describing whether this data provider is currently enabled and the type of source (manual entry, imported etc).

IsProviderEnabled.description: If false, results from this data provider are not currently enabled
IsProviderEnabled.title: Is Provider Enabled

ID.description: The reference ID for this provider status type
ID.title: ID

description.description: The Title of this status type
description.title: Description

chargePointID.description: ID value for the OCM site (POI) this image relates to.
chargePointID.title: Charge Point ID

comment.description: Optional description of image or context
comment.title: Comment
